document.full_text: the united auto workers will seek a commitment from general motors co  to build new products at two idled plants in tennessee and wisconsin in upcoming contract negotiations, a top union official said on tuesday.
document.title: uaw vying for new gm products in contract talks
lines_and_colors: the united auto workers will seek a commitment from general motors co  to build new products at two idled plants in tennessee and wisconsin in upcoming contract negotiations, a top union official said on tuesday.
